title: Should Christian Reformed Church Agencies stop Political Lobbying?
description:
Paul Vander Klay hosts a discussion with Daniel Brown https://www.facebook.com/FirstChristianReformedChurchOfKingston/ , Rob Toornstra https://www.sunnyslope.org/testimonial/understanding-gods-grace/ and Doug Vander Griend. 

about Overture 14 which asks Synod to stop political lobbying. 

The "OSJ" is the Office of Social Justice http://justice.crcna.org/ 

Overture 14 is found on page 324 of the Agenda for Synod of the CRCNA https://www.crcna.org/sites/default/files/2018_agenda.pdf 

Preview video https://youtu.be/u4emLKOSwxQ
